selectedVerses.text: He gathered to himself the Ammonites and the Amalekites, and went and defeated Israel. And they took possession of the city of palms.
Behold, I have engraved you on the palms of my hands; your walls are continually before me.
You shall put all these on the palms of Aaron and on the palms of his sons, and wave them for a wave offering before the LORD.
The nave he lined with cypress and covered it with fine gold and made palms and chains on it.
But when they went to bury her, they found no more of her than the skull and the feet and the palms of her hands.
